Key Match Events: Michael Harris II made a jaw-dropping home run robbery catch in the seventh inning
Post-Match Reflections: Atlanta Braves manager Brian Snitker highlighted the catch as unforgettable and noted the team's damaged division title hopes
Braves starting pitchers have allowed three runs or fewer in 20 straight games, a streak dating back to 1893
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was remembered for Michael Harris II's incredible catch, overshadowing the Braves' 3-0 loss
